mapper.select: select p_id, m_no, p_name, o_amount, o_name, o_price, c_name, c_name2, storeName, sb_amount, PA_CHANGE_NAME, o_no from SHOPPING_BASKET join PRODUCT_OPTION using(o_no) join product using(p_id) join PRODUCT_ATTACHMENT using(p_id) join category using(c_id) join seller using(s_no) where m_no = #{mNo} and PA_FILE_LEVEL = 1 and O_STATUS = 'Y'
select o_No from product join product_option using(p_id) where p_id = #{pId} and rownum = 1
